org.svvrl.goal.core

Interface EditableListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAccEditor, AbstractNBWLikeAccEditor, AbstractNGBWLikeAccEditor, AbstractNRWLikeAccEditor, AbstractNTBWLikeAccEditor, AbstractNTGBWLikeAccEditor, AbstractNTRWLikeAccEditor, ACTLEditor, AltAutomatonPropertyEditor, AltConnectorPropertyEditor, AltStatePropertyEditor, AltTransitionPropertyEditor, AutomatonPropertyEditor, BuchiAccEditor, ClassicAccEditor, CoBuchiAccEditor, ControllableTab, EditablePropertyEditor, EditorTab, FormulaEditor, GamePropertyEditor, GameStatePropertyEditor, GeneralizedBuchiAccEditor, GraphicComponentPropertyEditor, InputSimulatorTab, MullerAccEditor, OmegaRegularExpressionEditor, ParityAccEditor, QPTLEditor, RabinAccEditor, ReachabilityAccEditor, RegularExpressionEditor, RunDagTab, RunTreeTab, SplitTreeTab, StatePropertyEditor, StreettAccEditor, Tab, TBuchiAccEditor, TCoBuchiAccEditor, TGeneralizedBuchiAccEditor, TMullerAccEditor, TParityAccEditor, TRabinAccEditor, TransitionPropertyEditor, TStreettAccEditor, TwoWayAltTransitionPropertyEditor

    public interface EditableListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    An EditableListener is a listener that is interesting in editable events.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void editableChanged(EditableEvent e)
      Invoked when properties of an editable object changed.

    • Method Detail

      • editableChanged

        void editableChanged(EditableEvent e)
        Invoked when properties of an editable object changed.
        Parameters:
        e - the event issued by the interested editable object
